content:
If you are applying for a role outside of the human resources field, you could replace "HR" with more general terms that still convey your skills and experience, such as "talent management", "people operations", or "employee relations".

For example:

* Experienced people operations professional with a proven track record of enhancing employee engagement and productivity, and implementing fair and inclusive policies. Seeking to apply my skills and knowledge in a new role.
* Accomplished talent management expert with a strong history of effectively supporting organizational HR efforts. Looking to utilize my expertise and continue growing in a new opportunity.
